level.heading: PRECEDENCE FOR USE OF RECREATION PROPERTIES (ยง 19-717)

level.text: The recreational use of properties under the direct control of the Department shall have direct precedence over use for other purposes, except where recreation properties in the immediate vicinity of a public school or charter school are the only recreation facilities available for school use.

Department facilities are the only playgrounds available for school use, it shall be the mutual responsibility of the unit director and the school principal to work out a satisfactory schedule of use.
by the Healthy Schools Act of 2010, effective July 27, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-209), published at 57 DCR 7548 (August 20, 2010).
